comments.author: shasan
comments.body: Quote from: MGLLOV12% on June 02, 2023, 11:47:01 AMHiWhy you have edited while original post was as mentioned below:Quote from: MGLLOV12% on June 02, 2023, 11:47:01 AMis a-oriented launchpad created on the Binance Smart Chain that provides developers with a simple, safe, and effective platform for creating new projects. Filter through the messy landscape in the binance smart chain funds generation system where rugs https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5449001.msg62131907#msg62131907 a potentially great ecosystem for development and growth. LOCKSWAP has initiated a solution to incentivize and reward all token holders in a way that is inclusive and with allowing the barrier to entry.Bounty Allocation: 10,000 LOCKGeneral Rules:1. Must join projects Telegram group. And Channel.2. All Bounty https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5449001.msg62131907#msg62131907 on bounty support  group.3. Follow our Twitter.4. Please note that any offensive or inappropriate behavior will lead to immediate disqualification from the campaign.5. Using multiple accounts, Cheating, etc are not allowed.6. bounty manager reserve the right to make changes to the conditions at any time.7. Must post your Daily report by following our Required Report Format. Never post in your format.Make proof of authentication post.Code:#proof of authenticationBitcointalk username:Telegram username:Joined campaign:BSC Wallet:Multiple Report Format:Code:week: #1Twitter profile link:Spreadsheet number:Retweet link:1.2.3.4.Tweet link:1.2.Telegram link:Spreadsheet number:Message link:1.2.3.4.5.Disclaimer: I am not a member of the team. Just the bounty is managed by me.Bounty ScheduleWeek 1: (05.07-11.07)Week 2: (12.7-18.07)Spreadsheet updating will start after end campaign.Limit and Allocation:Twitter 60%: 200 Partisipants.Telegram 40%: 200 Partisipants.SpreadsheetTwitterTelegramRules:1. Every participant must follow the Lockswap.2. Twitter account must have a minimum of 500 followers.3. Twitter account must be original (90% in Twitter audit).4. Participants must like and retweet at least 4 tweet and create 2 tweet every week. You will not get your reward for like or retweet alone. You need to like and retweet in order to get full stakes.6. Participants must use  #LOCK #Swap #DeFi #Farm #Dex #binance hashtags in every retweet and tweet.Reward:More than 500 followers: 1 stakesMore than 3000 followers: 3 stakesMore than 5000 followers: 6 stakesJoin HereRules:1. Update your Telegram name to "Your Name |Lockswap''.2. Replace your profile picture with the Lockswap logo.3. Write constructive messages in Lockswap or other crypto-related telegram groups/channels.4. Deleted messages will not be counted.5. Report your telegram message links weekly. Please obey the report dates and format.6. Download avatar from here.7. Maximum of 5 messages will be counted per week.Reward:For join: 5 stakesWearing the Logo: 5 stakes.Adding "| Lockswap" to your Telegram name: 5 stakesPer constructive messages: 2 stakes. Maximum 10 stakes.Join HereIs it for mistake as you wanted to post from another account or something else.
